comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: On June 28, 2011, seanredmond suggested where this photo was taken; thank you for your efforts to #mapBK!

comment.author: 79759083@N00
comment._content: This photo was taken from the steeple of the Flatbush Dutch Reformed Church, at Flatbush Avenue, not Ocean Avenue. The shadow of the steeple is in the foreground. The church itself is not visible in the photo, which it should be if we were looking east from Ocean Avenue. The height from which the photo was taken is another cue: there were no other tall structures in the area at the time.
